author: cms-trackeralign
body:
resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/38506

#### PR description:

This PR has 3 commits:
   * 1ac393ce9dbd37d6f1944233b100b527425611ea addresses the comments left in this review: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/38449#pullrequestreview-1018465985
   * 63c4850f1b64c00b97ad7355335d29e95122ddc0 +  https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/38508/commits/2ee03912aac32859f03b10528c64f8744330325d resolve issue #38506

#### PR validation:

Run the `Alignment/TrackerAlignment` unit tests successfully

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Not a backport but will need to be backported.
title: Follow up to new high granularity pixel alignment for the PCL
